help_administration_timezone.lang_hat1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_administration_timezone.lang_hat4: Select your network's time zone from the drop-down menu.
help_administration_timezone.lang_hat5: Automatically adjust clock for daylight saving changes
help_administration_timezone.lang_hat6: Select this option to have the Router automatically adjust for daylight saving time.
help_administration_timezone.lang_hat7: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
